Name: RAY OF ENFEEBLEMENT
Description: A black beam of enervating energy springs fram yourfinger toward a creature within range. Make a rangedspell attack against the target. On a hit, the target dealsonly half damage with weapon attacks that use 5trengthuntil the spell ends.At the end of each of the target's turns, it can makea Constitution saving throw against the spell. On asuccess, the spell ends.
